books.author: by Paul Kalanithi
books.description: A memoir by a physician who received a diagnosis of Stage IV lung cancer at the age of 36.
books.name: WHEN BREATH BECOMES AIR

books.author: by Michael V. Hayden
books.description: A former C.I.A. director defends his policies.
books.name: PLAYING TO THE EDGE

books.author: by Sue Klebold
books.description: The mother of one of the Columbine shooters wrestles with her grief and guilt and discusses how parents can become more aware of the signs of mental illness in teenagers.
books.name: A MOTHER'S RECKONING

books.author: by Ta-Nehisi Coates
books.description: A meditation on race in America as well as a personal story by The Atlantic's national correspondent; a National Book Award winner.
books.name: BETWEEN THE WORLD AND ME

books.author: by Richard D. Mahoney
books.description: The relationship between Jack and Bobby. Originally published in 1999.
books.name: THE KENNEDY BROTHERS

books.author: by Ron Chernow
books.description: A biography of the first Treasury secretary, a major author of the Federalist Papers and an advocate of strong central government.  Originally published in 2004 and the basis of the Broadway play.
books.name: ALEXANDER HAMILTON

books.author: by Bill Bryson
books.description: An American expatriate travels around his adopted country, Britain.
books.name: THE ROAD TO LITTLE DRIBBLING

books.author: by Daniel James Brown
books.description: The University of Washington’s eight-oar crew and their quest for gold at the 1936 Berlin Olympics.
books.name: THE BOYS IN THE BOAT

books.author: by Richard Engel
books.description: NBC’s chief foreign correspondent discusses the Arab Spring and war in the Middle East.
books.name: AND THEN ALL HELL BROKE LOOSE

books.author: by Adam Grant
books.description: A Wharton School professor argues that innovators are made, not born, and offers suggestions for how to become one.
books.name: ORIGINALS

books.author: by Atul Gawande
books.description: The surgeon and New Yorker writer considers how doctors fail patients at the end of life, and how they can do better.
books.name: BEING MORTAL

books.author: by Jane Mayer
books.description: An account of how the Koch brothers and other super-wealthy donors deployed their money to change American politics.
books.name: DARK MONEY

books.author: by Douglas Brinkley
books.description: Theodore Roosevelt's crusade for conservation. Originally published in 2009.
books.name: THE WILDERNESS WARRIOR

books.author: by Pope Francis with Andrea Tornielli
books.description: In a conversation with a Vatican reporter, the pontiff explores his faith.
books.name: THE NAME OF GOD IS MERCY

books.author: by Brian Kilmeade and Don Yaeger
books.description: The war against the Barbary pirates in 1801.
books.name: THOMAS JEFFERSON AND THE TRIPOLI PIRATES
